snippet.title: Arcade Game: Boxing Bugs (1981 Cinematronics)
snippet.description:
A shooting game with boxing elements assort of like Star Castle. In the center of the screen is a player-controlled rotating cannon, enclosed within an octagon. The cannon shoots fireballs from one end and has a boxing glove on an extension arm on the other end. The octagon is a protective wall for the cannon. Fireballs and the boxing glove pass over the wall to targets outside.

Note:  Re-uploaded for fixed sound. I did however used infinite panics here this game is hard to play. The game is also endless here, after playing like 18 levels, I quit since there's no point in continuing.
